summary: Configured all free Cloudflare features using Global API Key: SSL/TLS (Full mode, TLS 1.3), Always Use HTTPS, Auto Minify, Brotli compression, HTTP/2, HTTP/3 (QUIC), 0-RTT, Early Hints, security settings, aggressive caching, and more. Cache purged. All optimizations enabled for production.
